statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -8 \\ 0 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 29 \\ 19 \\ 0 \\ -38 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
